comment.author: 67856797@N00
comment._content:
anybody interested in 19th century Japan, I strongly recommend to read "Unbeaten Tracks in Japan" by Isabella Bird. She travelled around Japan on her own, on horseback in the 1880s from Yokohama, to Tokyo, via Imaichi, Niigata, Yamagata, Aomori up to Hokkaido to study the Ainu - fascinating travelogue!
邦訳は「日本奥地紀行」
